price: ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߝߏߦߌ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߡߊ߫ ߞߋߟߊ ߟߎ߫ ߛߐ߬ߛߐ߬ ߸ ߓߌ߲߬ߓߊߏ ߜߋ߲ߜߋ߲ߦߊ߫ ߘߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߘߐ߫
arabic: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: in kullun illā kadhaba al-rusula faḥaqqa ʿiqābi
